channel.title: FroyoScape is in need of a hoster!
channel.description:
FroyoScape is in need of a hosted! Curious about what FroyoScape is? Go to our official topic!
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,567011.0.html
FroyoScape is open source, so really, you cant steal our source.
Here are some of FroyoScape's ideas!
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596994.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596978.0.html http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596991.0.html
Here's the application: [code=Application] Skype: Age: Have you ever hosted before: Hosting Specs: Name: Extra: [/code]

item.title: FroyoScape is in need of a hoster!
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:34, topic:478849”][quote author=ownerbasgar link=topic=597067.msg4245548#msg4245548 date=1362076129]
I can help u with anything u want add me on FACEBOOK:

Yenthe haesevoets
[/quote]
Since your small brain can’t comprehend such intellectual comments (We are all intelligent because I said so) I’ll help you out. Arham no longer need host no moar.[/quote]

just let the thread die, you moron

Read full topic

item.title: FroyoScape is in need of a hoster!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Arrav, post:30, topic:478849”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=597067.msg4230688#msg4230688 date=1361247094]

Didn’t KroniKz_ offer you a vps on your development thread?

KroniKz_:

I have a vps with 1.75gb ram, message me on skype if you want it.

I didn’t want him as the hoster.

And also, hosters will be admin in game

Ahh, I kinda miss Kroniikz, Btw why would you make the hoster admin when they have a chance at taking everything and using it for themselves? It’d probably be best if they would be considered the “owner” since you probably won’t get a hoster that way. Unless people are willing of course.
[/quote]LOLOLOLOL. How is it possible to miss him?

Your brains are probably MA’SHED Brains. That rhymes with BA’SHED Brains.

I haven’t talked to him in a few weeks, nor ever seen is name mentioned within that time period. Go to school pls.[/quote]lolwat?

Read full topic
item.source: FroyoScape is in need of a hoster!

KroniKz_:

I have a vps with 1.75gb ram, message me on skype if you want it.

And also, hosters will be admin in game

Ahh, I kinda miss Kroniikz, Btw why would you make the hoster admin when they have a chance at taking everything and using it for themselves? It’d probably be best if they would be considered the “owner” since you probably won’t get a hoster that way. Unless people are willing of course.
[/quote]LOLOLOLOL. How is it possible to miss him?[/quote]

Your brains are probably MA’SHED Brains. That rhymes with BA’SHED Brains.

I haven’t talked to him in a few weeks, nor ever seen is name mentioned within that time period. Go to school pls.

Read full topic

item.title: FroyoScape is in need of a hoster!
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:18, topic:478849”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=597067.msg4205267#msg4205267 date=1358830090]

wtf why would you make froyo open-source? you do realize if your server gets big and popular people are just going to steal your source, host it, advertise the love out of it and make money…

Good for them. I believe in trust and equality. It’s up to them to know what to do when they host my server and don’t update the server because they don’t know anything.

Lol ‘trust’… When you get older arham… Thatll be a great day :]

you look 9 though
[/quote]
Amanda todd pls[/quote]
that’s supppeeerr uncalled for…

Read full topic

@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:20, topic:478849”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=597067.msg4204786#msg4204786 date=1358750808]
Good for them. I believe in trust and equality. It’s up to them to know what to do when they host my server and don’t update the server because they don’t know anything.
[/quote]
wtf this isnt magical fairy land

no one cares about trust/equality. people are going to steal your source and your ideas, pay programmers better then you and me to do everything for them and make a ton of money

in this world you gotta have a donald trump attitude to make it[/quote]
And you’ve gotta bump this. I removed that thought a while back + I don’t need a hoster anymore…
